examples.text: her dances are as authentically Brazilian as their creator

definitions: in the traditional or original way, or in a way that faithfully resembles an original

examples.text: finding someone to cook curry authentically can be a real challenge

shortDefinitions: in traditional or original way, or in way that faithfully resembles original

definitions: (in existentialist philosophy) in accordance with an emotionally appropriate, significant, purposive, and responsible mode of human life

examples.text: am I living authentically, in a way that embodies my personal values?

shortDefinitions: (in existentialist philosophy) in accordance with emotionally appropriate, significant, purposive, and responsible mode of human life
